summary: the flaviviridae family comprises single-stranded RNA viruses that enter cells via clathrin-mediated pH-dependent endocytosis. the flaviviridae family comprises single-stranded RNA viruses that enter cells via clathrin-mediated endocytosis. the online version of this article (10.1186/s12964-019-0349-z) contains supplementary material. the online version of this article contains supplementary material available to authorized users. co-localization profile for ZIKV capsid protein and subcellular marker proteins in Baf A1-treated Vero cells. co-localization profile for ZIKV envelope protein and subcellular marker proteins in NH4Cl-treated Vero cells.
